name: ANTS MUST DIE
description:
This is a project created by Team 2 of the Miami University Game Design Club (Jackson Clayton, CosmicCloud, Intriux, Mocker's Jay, Cosmelon, Jacket, CaseyCross2, Eddy Reds, GemmaGrey, Randall)

Go on a quest to get cake for the queen by killing hundreds and hundreds of innocent ants. I hope you feel bad about yourself.
